item.title: Workflow Dashboard Page
item.description: Monitor and control your project’s workflow Review key Risks, Issues, Assumptions, Dependencies & Constraints. Monitor & Control Use the phase progression feature to track project progress. Get Started » Pending Actions View and Execute your pending actions direct from the dashboard. Get Started » Manage Key Project Elements Risks / Issues - Ensure risks don’t turn into issues. Constraints - Ensure you work within project constraints. Dependencies - Create reliable project plans.
